titleStmt.title: Book of Leinster, formerly Lebar na Núachongbála
Vol. 3
an electronic edition
titleStmt.editor: R. I. Best and M. A. O'Brien
titleStmt.funder: The HEA via the LDT Project

publicationStmt.publisher: CELT: Corpus of Electronic Texts: a Project of University College, Cork
publicationStmt.distributor: CELT online at University College, Cork, Ireland.

availability.p: Available with prior consent of the CELT programme for purposes of academic research and teaching only.

Copyright for the printed edition rests with the School of Celtic Studies, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies, Dublin. The electronic edition was compiled with the kind permission of the copyright owner.

listBibl.head: The edition used in the digital edition

titleStmt.title: Book of Leinster, formerly Lebar na Núachongbála
titleStmt.editor: R. I. Best and M. A. O'Brien

samplingDecl.p: The present text represents pages 471–638 and page 663 of the volume. The Metrical Dindshenchas are available in separate CELT files and have been omitted here. The Prose Dindshenchas, editorial introduction, notes and indexes have also been omitted.

correction.p: Text has been checked and proofread twice.

normalization.p: The electronic text represents the edited text. All corrections and supplied text are tagged. Missing text supplied by the editors is tagged sup. Expansions to the text are marked ex.

segmentation.p: div0=the whole document; div1=the section; stanzas are marked lg.

interpretation.p: Names of persons (given names), and places are not tagged. Terms for cultural and social roles are not tagged.

profileDesc.creation: By Irish scribes in monastic scriptoria, based on older materials. 1150–1190

langUsage.language: The text is in Middle Irish.

change.item: Value of div0 "type" attribute modified, content of 'langUsage' checked; minor modifications made to header.
Script written and run to correct line-breaks.
File proofed (2); markup adapted; more structural and content markup applied to file, header inserted from companion file.
File captured, basic xml markup applied.

head.sup: Gilla Cóemáin: Hériu ard inis na rríg

lg.l: tíar i Cúil Cesra a coícait.
co n-erbailt de thám iar tain
Cethri meic in laích don lind.
And sin luid Fergus ria chlaind.
Da cét bliadan blad cech druing
Sé bliadna déc is da cet
hi tri longsib ni fáth fand
Eochu mac Eirc in rí raith
ro gaet ar tús i nHerind. H.
Ro giallad do Lug don láech.
bás hui Dían Cecht i Caíndruim.
bás in Dagdai derg na ndrend
Mac Cuill Mac Cecht Mac Grene;
Mac Cuill la Éber inn óir.
Mac Cecht do laim Herimoin. H.
ba leis ind Heriu a óenor
A thrí meic.iii. bliadna ar blad
co bás Mumne i mMaig Crúachan;
ro marbtha i cath Aird Ladrand.
ní dalb i cath Temrach tricc.
Sé bliadna fa dí in tucaid.
niru maith in mac mílib tor.
rí na n-éces ard a rath
i mMaig Inis do thám trá
Berngal mac Gede in gáeth grind
ro thairind sin gleicc a gail.
a thrichait cét láech iar ló
la Bress Rig mac Airt Imlich;
aided meic Airt inn airm chrúaid.
Simón Brec sé bliadna ar becht.
rop é in t-iarla cen anrecht;
la Duach Find mac Sétna sláin.
Da bliadain déc réil a rath.
fichi ro chaith for cach leth.
Art mac Lugdech laechda a gluinn.
ní cian os bruinne in Braga.
ra lochrad in chraeb cen chol.
ic ól na flede ic Labraid.
Ro chaith Meilge maith a lí
sin chath la Mog Corb Cláire.
Mog Corb a mMumain cen meirgg.
la Fer Corbb mac Moga Cuirb.
A cethair fa chóic cen cheo.
é ro glacc in duirb drechmais.
Deich &mdot;bliadna fo trí i tuilg Te
Fiche acht sé bliadna ar blad.
ba sním ri cuane Chnuic Breg.
Cóic bliadna na ré cu rrath.
brath is bét do Banba bind.
In Fintait Már a mMumain maith.
Ré da bliadan déc búan breth.
Cóic bliadna déc dó iar sin.
noco bréc in scél dia chlaind.
docer rí na recht do rind.
bás ríg na llaech sin Brudin.
is bét cuimnech i lLeith Chuinn.
rí crúaid Cnucha i cath Aichle.
A sé fichet cen tathair trait
Art mac Cuind calma ro glacc.
ro mbáid i Tig Clettig crúaid.
i cath Duib Chommuir la Colla;
ic Dabull la mac Cruind cain
A ocht d'Eochaid ní bréc sain.
Tri bliadna déc datta in barr.
ni dalb os Muir Icht elach
ro giallad do niurt Nath Í;
i Sléib Elpa na n-arm n-án.
Sé rig déc se fichit ríg.
is é lín ro gab dar éis Herind.

div1.head: Gilla Coemain cecinit. Attá sund forba fessa

lg.l: remes cech ríg ro gab gíall
ro baí in tAed fergach Findlíath.
Da bliadain déc Bríain na mbend.
Cia beith cách i costecht riss.
fiss a rrand is rígda in scél.
fis a cland is a cenel.
ix. ríg o Aed Sláne slán.
oenrí a Cairpriu cass a graig.
Ix. ríg im Aed Sláne sluind.
Uii. ríg do Chlaind Cholmáin Móir.
oenrí a mMumain maith a chíall.
co torchair Brian na mbreccbratt. A.
Cóic bliadna déc is sé chét
tria ladraib mo lám ro lass.
a grád imm anmain attas. A.,

div1.head: Gillae Coemain cecinit. Analad anall uile

lg.l: rímim ar is rús cen ail.
Da cét a dó nóchat nár
o Abram noí cét ní scíth.
O Duíd co Brait ni bréc
o Brait co Crist caín a bla.
co gein Meic Maire tall tair
o mesc in Tuir co flaithNín;
O gein Abram eól dam sain
da bliadain cóic cét co cert
is na ré ro gabsat tair
Themas ba hé ainm in ríg
is and luid i n-úir in rí
A sect trichat iar Cund chrúaid.
co torchair Find leo ciar fell.
bás Tuathail Mael Gairb co ngráin.
co cath Slebe Toad Truim i
and ro marbad mór in chrech.
Fichi a cóic o ⋅ain i scél grind.
i torchair Aed Mend mac Colgan.
Ó chath Uchbad mor in bét
X vel is bliadain ci atber.
co tres Mugna mór in cath.
Ocht &mdot;bliadna iar sin co bás Flain
trí bliadna iar n-éc Flaind Fáil.
Mael Mithig. Mael Maire in mál
Fiche bliadan a cóic cen chair.
o chath na Craibe 's a deich.
A Christ a grían os cach gurt.
Ina ndíaid ba rrí cia rel.
la Nuadait Necht na slúag sen.
ba bét cen brath brón na baind.
Tuathal Techt cen tam co tlí
Ro gab Mál Temraig na tor.
ro thathaim na thúaith coa thaig.
Ro gab gialblaid cech drui&ndot;g de.
Slecht la Mac Con cen chacht cned.
a díth ro dámair sin chath.
ra chroch cen bréic coa thír thes.
uair ro crád ro cáin ria cath.
caín ci&ndot;g for orba a ré
maíti in tAirgdech a díth de.
is cath Duib Chommair cía thois.
den bruig ba bét ciaro bá
coro chluí a brétho a blaid
do neim ní dalb drongge&ndot;g díur.
de Muir Ict ni bethu ba.
co tres &mdot;Bríain nád búir dia mbá
Ailill maith Molt mac Nath Í
ba flaith for Colt in caemrí;
co torchair ba bét i cath.
cen moltho thall na sund de.
rod báid fín ra loisc tene.
Mael Mór cen laice fria lá
Aed Dub i rRaith Bic bil báin.
ro gaeth co tric na thigdáil.
ro ndacht cen dergnus dál de.
Ro gáetgáb cen grad im ga.
ba holc a ordd dia dúr dul.
ort i nDún Bolgg la Brandub.
ro chacht éc cen chobrainn cain.
fuair duilge drend dú ro ba.
iar cét cath co cóemlí chend.
Dub Dúin din chúain Chorpri chaiss.
Ro thathaim in tan ba trú
úar ro gaelad tria gním ga.
ro tenna co trocha a thli.
tess Temair de thám cen tláis.
atbath in rí de deoin Dé
Mael Sechnaill slecht sluinn co sain.
hi fích Átha Clíath co cul.
ro bíth in Níall glan Glúndub.
ó Mac Dé díanglan ro det.
ba glé ro giallad a glacc.
Brian co mbardlí uas barr Breg.
ar torcc tromm ba galar garg.
cia té flaith fénnend co fí
a Christ ron cruthaig hi crí
Ro faith Nín. Cir. Dair. dia éis.
ním nert acht Mac Dé de.
na rrí na recht na rige. R.
for nem rop dil dithig Dé
nó in do chenach vel in d gasciud.
Cia de as dilsiu doib for domun
Mad ail do Dia bid inniu duit
Don treib is amru ro gabsat
da bérla déc ar tri fichtib
Scol mór la Faenius ic foglaim
ro bíd co amra in cech berlu.
ár cumtach in Tuir la tuaith talman
mac do Néol ar &ndot;dul i nÁegipt
Síd mór i mbátar la Foraind
Cid in tan na terna Foraind
ecla la claind Neóil dia ndaerad.
Luid Srú mac Esrúi iar tanaib
anais and a chland cen digna
ic irraí na rríg cen baigul
boí dias díb i fail cech oen&fdot;ir.
Cuib. Cliu Cera Sair Slán Lige
Ruc Cruithne mac Ci&ndot;ge a mná uadib
la mná Bresse la mna Basse
dar noí tonnaib don lir lethan.
Ro gab Herimón co lleith in t⋅luaig
Ro gab Dond cosin leith aile
ba marb ic ascnam cen chomais
Co tuarcbad carn la lia a cheneoil
Fir Da Gial o Gréin co Coraid
Mathe Dál Chaiss Dal Cein cetaig
Dál Moga Dal Cuirc Dal Caeta
do chlaind Ír meic Míled midir
Corc Oiche cloe cloth cen timme
Seomuit ni duit do muntir Bregoin
Derb lem cip é rodos ríme

div1.head: Mac Cosse fer legind Ruis Ailithir cecinit.

lg.l: da uarda i n-immul túaid tess.
iss é iss attreb do doenib;
is é ro delig Dia dían.
Tri ranna in domuin tíar thair.
tri ranna i tát sil Adaim;
ben ro gab ríge ind airthir.
Asia ni terc thair a tí
bec nach ruc leth le na slait.
Ón tírsin co sruth nInd síar.
Rofess a mmaith as cach aird.
a margaréit a hur i n-or.
a bbúain fa dó i n-oenbliadain.
o Ind síar saigit na fir.
O Muir Ruad ragaid dar ré
Aráib co mirr co túis thair.
Ni haisc atát tair na fir.
toeb ri toeb is Muir Romuir.
i lleth ri sruth Níl fodess.
ni haisc atá fóir na fer
tír i tá Tigir luath lond.
Uigir ar hur Chaisp ria gáir.
tuatha De beit im ro&fdot;is. R.
mac do Chethuir is do Abrám;
Ainm di Libia on gáeith grind.
i lleth fri hEgipt iar sís.
is Dara a ainm ica bun.
mad tair is é a ainm Nuchul.
a ainm co roich Muir Torrian.
's é te cid cían on muir.
Is ri sruth atúaid atá tír.
tir n-onagri is gaem co mblad.
In tírsin cia beith dia fat.
ní himda a bláth cibé atcheth.
tír da tarat ainm Affer. A.
is í tuc ainm dond Eoraip.
siar co sruth Réin ar mórméit
toeb ra tóeb do deiss Danuib.
Greic o Thracia feib as lia.
co sruth Réin is ed atchíat
In Arcáid ría anair ni ceist.
i tá cloch dian ainm asbest.
In Róim co hurgna ara lár.
acht i lleth sair ri Gallia.
tír is tarbach rofess on. R.
duine ro delb Dia na ndám;
iar ndenam na ndúl ro rígad
ros lín miad merda cen main.
i céin dia clannaib co cert.
d'asnéis da clannaib is dia ceilib
Ni thalla i llittrib na llaídib.
Mar nach derna nech riam romum
rátur rand do dréim nar daer;
Píb ainm do mnai Cain chintaig
impi in eóit luchair in lennán.
cen choi cen gári ba gand.
sin mairt mna bat gléri ar gaís.
dóib ropo mac Nél na noídin.
do thes na gréni sin glind.

l.sup: o ro gabsat sloind Gaedil glana

lg.l: Bith is Ladru nir lucht legind.
's a cland 's a curi do thám.
Cera i crich Connacht na cairddi.
is Eua i tír Charpri cheirt.
a n-ordd ba cuimnech i céin.
is o Chnucha in chairn is cubaid
ra Gand Etar co mbríg búain
selb in trén ar tuind cen tacha.
dia gluind féin in fatha fúair.
ba é a comainm Banba bind
Etan co luinni is co lluathi.
is me nos canand co crúaid.
i Caillid Cúain sét dar sluagaib
mór cét co tuagaib ro thaill.
Balar mac Doid meic Néit nertmair.
Ceochuir glicc gel glún na gad.
ainm uathi for tuind na tarma
dia sluind co calma iarna crad. A.
ras mill miad in betha bricc
Fial ben Lugdach móir meic Itha.
dia síl ros rimed do raith.
is uathib ni cranna is cuman.
oen dib Mumni mór a mes.
is dias co cuibdi cach ca&ndot;gni.
is lé Emain is Ard Macha.
garg glond a catha co gád
a tríar ingen Áni is Pasi.
laích ro loisc Chobthach ciar chol.
is ó lágnib a láech Lagin.
nir maeth ar magin a mmod.
co méin is co mergus garg.
Aís ba hathair Duind na ndúan.
Ésa a ingen olc a hord.
ua da hathair siur da mathair
rád in drúad nar liach do liathad
i cath Chliach sciathach co scéim.
cid trén a tairim ri Tuaig Inbir
ainm fuair on ingin ro ges.
meic Duind Desa datta a lí
is mathair mór na Find Emna
Mugain Medb co lleithni is Lothra
a n-anmand is cell cia chanam
a n-anmand Ciar. Corc is Conmac.
ba triar torc borrbalc ni bréc.
cland Chlothrand is na Find co fubaib.
meic Echach thres ra dál dochur.
Bres Nár. is Lothur na llerg.
co clú chumaing Delga osin dind.
Bríg Brethach a thres ben bulid
Dún Da Lethglass dún cíuin Celtchair
dun in triuir chertglain cen chair.
a cland Noisi is Andle is Arddán.
Buan ben Mes Gegra ciar dimbúan.
ri Cairpre Nia Fer cu fí
ainm uathi ar tulaig ac Temraig.
o Nim na fuath Ferta Nimi.
ra dlechta a lligi ras len.
siur Echach diar ben Tear treorach
ba cían a com&fdot;erg i cath
no ro halt i n-iathaib Ulad
dias d'Albain is do Lochlaind luind.
da mnai Lugdech mer meic Echach
di chlaind Lóith meic Dáiri déin.
díb ra boí in bóroma o Lagnib
'ca torchair Cond na cét cath cróda
ben Bresail meic Cirb na n-echór
cen merg cen methol cen brath.
tri meic Cuind na cet cath cróda.
dib gairm goi bindi cen brinna
tria bríg bunaid glacc na gona.
is é ém síl Saidbi saíri
vel is ingen drúad Díl nar dorcha
ras tuc cen temel mar thaircim.
ciar gáib cliamain Cuind na ceilid
do láim luind Nemid na níam.
mór raith bad roga ra ruisc.
vel inn í Feidel teist cen tnú
vel inn í Ciarnath 'cun broin borddaig
is iat sin mná Find co fedaib.
nar thim ra cnedaib a cnis.
nó is ingen Bénni Britt Funchi.
ra chuir ra cetaib a chnes.
ben cen mairg co méin ras massig
Taidg meic Chein Chassil cen chess.
siur Chremthaind crúaid gein ra gnathaig
fúair neim don brathair ro bréc.
Trí meic Echach móir ra Mo&ndot;g&fdot;ind.
is Niall ri Cairind co céil.
meic Mo&ndot;g&fdot;indi iar fáth ba sídaig.
guth gnáth nar crichaib o chéin.
Maini na miad ní da dignib
do Niall ri Rignaig in raith.
Inniu ben Neill in drui&ndot;g dagduind.
Cichurid mac Cruind Cáelbod iar &mdot;breith Dabla.
ba leis in Banba 's a buirid.
o fuil Glend Arad in Ruit.
commám Dá Thi miad nad gand.
mac dóib Ailill Molt in milid
A&ndot;gas ben Nad Fraích co fír.
Oengus mac Nad Fraich fer uallach.
vel is ingen ríg Bretan Manand
ben Oengusa meic Nad Fraích fraíchaig
im rannaib móraib na mná. Adam.
uair is co bunad bríg bermait
cech ní is dír dlegmait do rad. A.
Core do chlaind Loegaire is Lugdech.
Marb ingen ríg Saxan srethach súairc.
ben meic Néil cáem ci atcheind.
Eogan mac Néil ro thend tuaid
mac do Charmac Caech mac Cairpri.
Diarmait a mmac mór cen merbuill
mac Neil meic Echach co n-aíb.
a cland Colmán is Áed nach fellad.
dib cland chland na ríg rádi.
cland Brenaind Daill cáid na cross
ben glic o Dún Suani sein.
breith in bunaid trén ro thréic.
is í sein a cland co cuibdi.
mathair do Mael Duin is d'Aelind
aed a ruin nir thairind tor.
da gaí chró ciar dodán dochair.
Dámnat áeb na gréni a gellám
Cland d'Áed ra Damnait maith moltair.
Mael Canaig ba fer co fírneim.
Fergus mac d'Aed mór mac Mo&ndot;gan
is don tren&fdot;ir do &Fdot;ergus ro an.
do chlaind ríg Ua Tuirtri tuirmech.
Land ben Aeda aird meic Ainmerech.
vel is mathair mall don triur threorach.
Land a siúr nar cheolach cnocc.
rap í sein Deoch Laidgneain lingil.
ra rathaig is ra selbaig sochair.
Buach ben Chana móir meic Gartnain
grad Cana is Créidi co cuibdi.
plág dedi is a cuimni i céin.
Gelgés ingen Gúair ben Chon Cho&ndot;gelt.
mer im mond a lom⋅erc réil.
Ingen do Mael Duin mac Aeda.
ro len inn uasi dia oilb.
a ben can chennach co culchair.
is iat sin mna Cellaig Cualand
ben meic Blaithmeic blaith rig Ulad.
nir thréic a bunad na báig.
bat ríg ar Herind iar Niall.
Dondchad a mmac. mór in flaith.
a cland ria cuanaib na caemdoss.
bríg is bunad Banba o chein.
Fland flaith Breg. Niall Caille clíarach
cíar lánóc fa glorda a gním.
ráid ria mathair maill cen merfaill
a cheim co imthréith ni thard.,
ingen do Mael Dún co ndemni.
dar daer Cul Dremni na ndro&ndot;g
a cland Cellach is Mael Findna
a mmeicc Mael Mithig na midól
a cland Dondchad mac Flaind línmair
maith in ben Lígach fria lind
is Aed mac Mael Mithig in mind.
Cacht cland Dondchaid móir meic Cellaig
Der Báil ra gnathaig dil daidbri.
is &fdot;oraindi a mborrfad is a mbág.
Hui Neill in chomlaind sin cath.
diarb ainm Glún ra Lár ba laech.
cind Hua Mani mór nar mer
i cathaib ba fuachda in fer.
Cland Taidg meic Cathail na caemdúan.
Der Báil bec di bith ra blaiss.
mathair Aeda Hui Neill inn aenig.
caema a geill na gemil glais.
Glun Iairn is Mael Sechlaind saidbir.
i céim ra cathaib ra chuir.
Bé Bind mathair Briain na mbreth.
a mmeic mac Briain Dondchad degmain
Braen rí Lagen mac Mael Morda
mna na rríg rigda do ráith.
Cummain Breccan bec a briathra cen baís.
senchas ban nach baeth ar bádud
ro gab leth o Adam oen. Adam.,
REdig dam a Dé do nim.
érniud mo chesta is gnim glan.
Trén ros étlá in bith buide.
Triar mac triar ingen cen ail.
Píb ainm do mnaí Cháin chain.
is cach óen no geinfed úad;
é féin ro thimmairg co trén.
Noe 's a trí meic cen mebail.
céin buí in diliu adbar n-áig.
do cech thaíb cid bad dattu.
conid é ar chloíne ro chind.
Doine na da cend co col.
Cech duine ata thair cen chend.
ac imthecht a glind i nglend;
Cethri meic mathe oc Chám chass.
Caus fo bruth na n-esgal n-án.
do chlaind Chauis meic Chaim na cles.
Clanna Futh meic Cáim do céin.
lucht na hAffraice as cech aird.
o Muir Marb co Muir Torrian.
Tuc Dia dith do cech thaíb tair.
i tír na llaignech co lléir.
Tri meic ic Alan cen brón.
Ro gon mór gelua da gáib.
Fúair o chach cadus is cháin.
Francus o tát Frai&ndot;c co fír.
Clanna Séim is iat is lia.
leo cen raind co Muir Torrian.
Coic meic ic Sém sochla in síl.
cu sliab Cucais cu sliab Tuir;
is ra claind Séim cach slige.
Elam ba cruaid crand a gai.
sloind i fus ria scur na scél.
Us mac Saram sochla in rí
Sala no bid or re att.
Trí meic déc ic Iachtan án
is leo cech rind is cech rían.
o sruth Ind co sruth nAcian.
ro gabsat ucht na da India.
in cech thir thend im Thigir.
trí noí cenel Sém na slat.
cia cairm i mbai sídmag selb
torud aíni in Rig roreid. R.

div1.head: Gilla in Chomded hua Cormaic cecinit.

lg.l: diaid i ndiaid ní lathar lesc;
Iss ed ra theich cu Persaib.
tuc forru ar tús adrad ed.
Cétdruí in domuin ri fath fiss.
rap í in cháem a chetmunter
Is é in macsin cen chor cirt
ba hé in sétserc ri sretha.
a thrí mug Cicir cu ngnim ger
assu leiss cech deilm dub dall
Cét traiged fat ind eich craind
cid truag dorochair do láim loir.
a mathair in gairb 's in glain
Cethri bliadna iar Troí gním gaeth
Cobthach Coel sund rí gaeth gar.
Almon ra thuit ar tús dano.
sé mili co méit co mblaid.
se chét mili ní bréc so.
da cét cóic mili co mblaid.
a ré i n-amsir meic Ugaine.
nó lucht ind eolais ní ferr
rab í fuin ba sona in snass
Id Moraind cid léir ra lass.
ní ní acht semind réid rindglass.
is rith ra reithed a rrind
Ré noí ríg déc diaid i ndiaid.
ó Ruth mac Rigo borr in blad
ed ro briss a lethrosc lór
a mucca remi is na diaid;
darrocht in muccid cáem a chlú
rofess bo hé a rád ratha.
Is desin bo ainm in Mess
iss é ras éit &ersir; ras ail
dar Slíab Fúait réim cen robud
Cotlait aidchi i n-oen a mbrug.
frith ar matain derb in dlug.
Lug mac Eithlenn do beirn Breg.
ra buí i ndeilb na noeden;
ba hé in lórbladach ra raind.
Na tri Fothaid tri meic iat
meic Cairpri Nia inn aig ardmaith.
a chend síar ri Liaic Sinnaig.
Glasdíc ainm do ar tús tind.
sech Loch nOrbsen o Loch Riach
I Mag Coraind co Es Rúaid.
ri táeb Sinna mairg ba mó
rap é a uide in n-aidchisin
síar co Slíab Da Chích nAnand
otá sein ba tolgda in tóir
Ra dith Find hua Fidga ic feiss
Is neim in gae. tossach trén
Secht n-aige ic Sléib Blod meic Con.
tuc do in ben a Sleib Slanga;
derb lind iss e cétchrod cain.
Find mac Geoir mac dá mathair
Ar bi bruth di echaib ríg Ruis
do mnai ra comlund a chuiss;
Ochtur do Chailti im chend Find.
Corra is ua Daim derg din lind
Is é sét is &fdot;err fuair Find.
Glassi fuair Find fecht réil riam
ní ní acht airget a findgrian
ba cú ba duine ba dam
Tricha sét ni gaes fir buirb.
tall Find a craes in chorrbuilg.
ar mac Lugdech lín cen locht
tene i coclaid locht iar ló
iss ed ra chorc a chaemó.
Ar sin brunnid breo di thein.
cora chorc a chluais nír cheil;
conad de dar gort re gairm
Ar sin doroic mummi in meic.
ba Lár a hainm cerb ammeit
is de ba Corc mac Lara.
iss e sin fri fute fecht
in cuicde is lia i scelaigecht.
Ac sein duit ocht fichit cest.
ra béim it múr os gréin glain.
tall it rún a Rí richid. A.

head.sup: Ailbe: Úar in lathe do Lum Luine

lg.l: Úar in lathe do Lum Luine
i lleith leinne ic Aige áin;
is úar cid d'ingin ú Chuind
foilces a moi&ndot;g a lloi&ndot;g láin.
co lLicc da Berg ac Srub Brain
fodirfe ar n-éc i nnach úair. U.
co mbert úan ropo deilm di
ferr lea a fethim cen chlaind ceirt
a bratán uas brí cia pé
ba blattdál cen brón cia bé
Co mbert Mugain mó cech claind.
Is sí seo cen bétblaid mbrath
ba hé a llín co &ndot;glórmud gel
A dó da cóic iarum and.
uas Chliu co tadbríg a treb.
Eochoid Fer Eich amra a gné

head.sup: Senchán Torpéist: A Pair ri sil nEogain Móir

lg.l: A Pair ri sil nEogain Móir.
in gubreth ro fuc in rí
ba col do Ailill a brath
ní baí cert na coir acht cath.
roínis for Mac Con cid garg.
is cían óbdar laechdai a bidg.
rodas gab o muir co muir.
la Cormac mac Airt meic Cuind.
ar bríg ar borrfud ar báig;
sech ní baí ni rabi riam
fo gne glaine cen loi locht
is é ba haire ba habb. A.
It eat sin for cech och
BEIR mo scíath sceo fri úath
co rraib ar cliu Chormaic Cais.
dia mboí Cú Ruí na nirt niad
chroderg á clách cailgg fria fraicc;
talla mucc messa a caill choir
is laind óir Ienas dia slaitt.
co &ndot;gés badb dia burd dia blai
ri hadart tend tricc mad truit
ni gabat greim grip guip gai.
Mo gai mo chlaideb mo scíath
ar cech n-aí ni fiach fir thaiss
m'&fdot;eoil da seche is sí om;
síd a charat ri Mac Con.
gop con gop gai glais fomgeir
tóeb do thabairt riu is dar timna
tungim nóil fom arm dric dron.
toeb do thabairt ri Mac Con.
Mo ⋅echt meic ros marb Mac Con
bid lais riam rad co faidc
nucu maith ri acna bít géill
Is gat fás flaith cen giallu.
naidm na ríge ar cind in meóir.
inn inbaid do chora i llén;
iss ed roda scara in scél.
i cath is cor anma i mod.
ro mertsa dar es mo neirt
aithle mo meic is Meic Con.
nach ocum fadéin ro thascius Cian
bad Cass ar écin a ainm.
cnet nach cinid sceo fri niad
ferfaid broí beir mo sciath. B.

head.sup: Ailill Ólomm: A Maccáin ná cí

lg.l: ro boí i tind fri cloich.
Ro boí i tind fri cloich

head.sup: Dub Dá Thúath: Diambad messe bad rí reil

lg.l: in scél bad áil dam do chleith.
is é in lind i coire toll.
a n-as dech do triall na túath.
is cert ro chan dún in bricht
cid do mac no thisad fritt.
co ríg Cassil cruind na cuan
na tucsu do ar Ruadán rán
is ferr trú anda truagan truag.
gáir glám dia guin cid cian gair
gair a ban i nnamat maidm
gair a muntire iar maidm fair.
Sluindfet a thrí buada ar bith
uasliu cech rád rí cech slán
is ferr cech dal dia tic síd.
gím do dáil dath funchi fúar
bláth snechtai ar sleib snaschur sin.
cech meic a chiall acht co tic;
dar éis a cuind di cech mnaí
o ca ch ⋅in atlaí a gaís &ndot;glic.
aisc for fell fortacht na fann
ni ar lín óc brister cath
a ellma as dech do cech rath.
A rrigni is messu don gaís
Druth cech mer miannach cech baeth
brocach cech saeth serb cech gnath.
gel cech nua. lond cech scíth
Is cert caich amal a nert
is súail ní is budi ri bocht
In bith is bith cáich ar úair.
curi cen chend cruit cen cheis
samail na tuath deis a rríg.
cen gair cech fan imtheid len;
mairg tír i tic in scél.
Scriss fora mét ni geib greim
ni cluchi mad tind ra tuind
tren talam cech bali is tend
uasliu in cend andait na buill.
is fiach o geltair ri nech
Ro scailed do chach a ord
is borbb nad aithgiuin a cheird.
cé théit muga. ní geib meirg
is e grind gonas mo chíall;
mac ind ríg do naidm na &ndot;giall.
Mac in tair a llus in táil
do chumma in chláir ina chirt.
ass e a dúal dechrad dia ⋅licht.
mac ind laích a llus na n-arm
do gabail co suairc na salm.
mac in lega leic liaig de
iss e a bés gabail gres glan.
mac in druith a llus glám &ndot;gér
a purt for a port tiar is tair;
Mac in chírmaire a llus chír
mac in chirb is é a bés guin.
Ni rodam nad beir a roí
ní suí nád athgiuin fa dí
For a clais tened cona thess
tress dobeir na catha for a cess.
Dobeir in n-ith is in mess. D.
is dir do rig is do &fdot;laith.

body.trailer: fis do chís co cert. C.

div1.head: Fothad na Canone cecinit cu Aed Ordnithe.

lg.l: cen on is cen ec. E.
for ríg cin cech a ndena.
ní tu ro marb acht is é
bendacht Crist for ríg roda croch
ropad ní a chland dia éis
tol Meic Dé cech a ndena
iss e do less rochuala. R.
gel cech nua lond cech scíth
iss ed is messu fuair laech
iss ed is messu tic tech
is lesc lemm beith cen amus
cia beith nech niba mé N.
ni mad bi ni mad chine
Biaid uair bud aithrech in baes
ni cech cnú foci&ndot;g dia croíb
Cech rí nad choisc a maccu.
Do meic do mogaid do grés
ní maith mac ríg cen rige.
cuir do maccu ar crich i ccein.
ní tharda i rréir neich aile
Rí ro delb nem násad n-ait
is dia réir atat in maic.
ni duit fognad a Chormaic. C.
is brath dun des a testa. T.
Is missi ra buí arin chirt
cia tát fir thalman im thaig
Is iatsum ro gab na salmu
Leis da ochair tul i tul
bud nenaid cu brath a lucht
niro mathius a olc do thrén
ric a less feiss ra degfer
a mbith i fás &ersir; i fán
Cid olc damsa bud olc dóib
Is missi ra boí arin choir
Cath ra clerchib mairg ra chuir
do neoch dan áil a chaimchlí
is adart uilc is fír trá
Cích na críni mairg na n-ib
cid caem a blath is a barr
Loscid in tene in crand úr
is é in tene cen dibad
A Chloch thall for elaid úair.
dia mba i cind meic Nessa náir.
dia luid do digail Ríg recht
is and forríth a lecht latt.
fuair lat lom tonnaid iar sain.
a tress ard Ailbe fria aiss;
ar is é ba ferr do laech
mairg a Lagnech i mba gnáis;
co fargbais i ndáil bain báis.
rot gialsat drui&ndot;g na fian find;
dot gleo frit chomthach ba gand
do mac Bronaig uas Brí Breg;
tairnit duit in t⋅luaig for ruth
coro chloemchlais cruth a chloch. A.
a dart Buti co tí bráth
bud é th'ainm la cách a chloch. A.
Inn eól dúib in senchas sen
ainm cech rig ro gab Chasel;
Oengus mac Nad Fraich fodlad brait
is é ro chreit do Patric;
Coirpre iar nAed no indled gail
Cormac iar sin soilsi a gart
Artrí iar Cathal caem a chlí
Olchobor iar sin suairc in mod.
Dub Lachtna iar sin suairc in mind;
Finguine iar sin suilsi a grad
Cormac iar sin soillsi a gart
maith in fer ros gab iar sin.
gabsat a cert cein buí thair
co n-uaill co n-ír co n-ernbass.
ba dé fertha fáth co saíre
ba hé tress rí adgeb guin
Eo dega deirg drui&ndot;g ar dreich
fail coic deich dóib doí fri doí

div1.head: Ossin cecinit.
div1.p: I cath Gabra ro marbad Oscur &ersir; Cairpre Liphechair

lg.l: OGum i llia lia uas lecht
mac ríg Herend ro gaet and.
do gae gand os gabur gil.
do muin a mairc maith is tres;
Oscur ro bí a lam dess.
roptar lia a mmairb inna mbéo;
is missi ros bí dom baiss.
i nn-inaim ba ruth dom rog;
ro marbaind torc i Caill Cháid.
no ⋅árgind én áith im og. O.
In t-ogum út fil isin chloich
cian bad chuman in t-ogom. O.
